entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
